newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB sets 13-week T-bill auction for Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB sets 13-week T-bill auction for Thursday.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) said on Tuesday it set a Dutch-style auction of a five billion tranche of 13-week Finance Ministry treasury bills for Wednesday.
Minimum price was set at 960,650 crowns for a one million crown bill, putting gross yield at 16.2 percent, and net yield at 12.15 percent.
The three-month Prague interbank offered rate (PRIBOR) stood at 17.31 percent on Tuesday, down from 19.32 on Monday.
